cells.data: -- isAlpha::Char - > Boolon isAlpha(c)	set ca to current application	set oRgx to ca's NSRegularExpression's ¬		regularExpressionWithPattern:("[A-Za-z0-9\\u00C0-\\u00FF]") ¬			options:(ca's NSRegularExpressionAnchorsMatchLines as integer) ¬			|error|:(missing value)	set oString to ca's NSString's stringWithString:c	0 < (oRgx's numberOfMatchesInString:oString options:0 ¬		range:{location:0, |length|:1})end isAlpha
